items.title: All Steps | TSK Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for TSK Connector. Phoenix connector for Autopsy / The Sleuth Kit. Include TSK in your automation workflows. Create cases, ingest data, generate reports, and list data sources.

items.title: AutopsyAddDataSource Step | TSK Connector Documentation
items.description: Add a Data Source to an Autopsy Case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: AutopsyCreateNewCase Step | TSK Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a new Autopsy Case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: AutopsyGenerateReports Step | TSK Connector Documentation
items.description: Generate Reports. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: AutopsyListDataSources Step | TSK Connector Documentation
items.description: List all Data Sources in an Autopsy Case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.
